info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: The Histogram component creates a histogramof the input data. Use a tab-delimited file with column headers as input. The options are contained in the html output file.
info.inputs: tab-delimited - Must have column headers in the first row.
info.outputs:
Histogram html file
Original Input Data File - unmodified
